cause.description:
Oprah started this amazing thing called Oprah's Angel Network, and I think it's a really noble cause.
I'd like to see how many people will actually help out by donating, raising funds, recruiting people, or even just joining to show support.
1. There are places where shelters and programs to help women and their families don't exist.
cause.mission: create more schools and programs that support women, children and families all around the world.
cause.name: Help Oprah's Angel Network
